definition: Eid al-Fitr or Feast of Breaking the Fast, celebrated on the last day of Ramadan

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to fast or abstain from meat, wine etc/vegetarian diet/study room/building/to give alms (to a monk)
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: Eid-al-Fitr marks the end of Muslim fasting month of Ramadan.
sentences.chinese: 開齋節標示著穆斯林齋戒月的結束。

sentences.english: Change from well-known after the Eid al-Fitr.
sentences.chinese: 從這以後開齋節變的很有名了。

sentences.english: There was a Festival of the Fast-Breaking Ceremony in the mosque today.
sentences.chinese: 今天在清真寺舉行了開齋節慶典。

sentences.english: Muslims attend the Eid-al-Fitr prayers at the Jama Masjid (mosque) in the old quarters of Delhi October 14, 2007 .
sentences.chinese: 穆斯林在印度德里的一間清真寺參與開齋節祈禱。

sentences.english: But, I will expected a lot of vehicles went there.
sentences.chinese: 但，我會預料開齋節會有很多人上雲頂。

sentences.english: The first day of Hari Raya, my father and again he planned to go Genting Highland.
sentences.chinese: 開齋節的第一天，我老爸再一次計劃到雲頂高原遊玩。

sentences.english: For Allah, I determine to perform two rakaats of the Eid-ul-Fitr Prayer following the Imam.
sentences.chinese: 我誠意爲主，跟從領導者，進行兩拜開齋節拜。

sentences.english: That few days of raya I work for my dad in his clinic.
sentences.chinese: 開齋節的那幾天都在我爸的診療所幫忙。

sentences.english: Today is the first day of Hari Raya Puasa .
sentences.chinese: 今天是回教開齋節的第一天。

sentences.english: "The Eid here is totally different from the Islamic world, " noted Auf.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的開齋節與伊斯蘭世界完全不同。
